Package com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.graphics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimatedSprite
    An extension of the LibGDX Sprite class with a built-in animation system.
    AtlasAnimation
    Creates and stores an Animation based on a TextureAtlas.
    ShapeBatch
    An extension of the ShapeRenderer with additional functionality.
